Before you adopt VMSSI, you must understand the architectural, disk, memory, and networking requirements. Even if you are experienced with the installation and service of z/VM, it is important that you read the instructions for installation of z/VM with or without VMSSI. If you are experienced with z/VM, or, are migrating from an older release, be aware that significant changes were made throughout the platform, beginning with Version 6 Release 2.
